backend/main.mo: Defines core types and data structures for books, meditation sessions, journals, profiles, rituals, and progress, plus a static book list.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata for removing a duplicate volume input in PreMeditationPage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries for all frontend files including routing, pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Provides step‑by‑step instructions for redeploying the app without code changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing deployment failures across build and deploy stages.
frontend/index.css: Defines OKLCH-based theme variables for light/dark modes and applies global Tailwind styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with runtime shims, global error handlers, and script bootstrap.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theme provider, error boundary, and root React app structure.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel for ambient sounds with audio preview, swipe navigation, mute/volume handling, and cleanup logic.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a detailed fallback UI with error, stack, component trace, and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Destructive alert banner for sync/load errors with retry button and optional custom title and description.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical nav with animated icon buttons that navigate to different app sections and show labels on hover.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide-out menu providing theme toggle, account status, login/logout navigation, and authenticated query clearing.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paginated reader for knowledge pages with swipe, keyboard navigation, animated transitions, and auto-scrolling to content.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel that highlights one category at a time with swipe, keyboard navigation, and dynamic scaling/opacity for surrounding items.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Dialog presenting a shuffled multi-question quiz with tracked answers, navigation, scoring, result view, and retake/reset logic.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, stem, and glow based on a growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Three.js particle system around the lotus that animates in chaotic or coherent patterns depending on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: A full-screen canvas effect rendering animated lotus petals and particles with theme- and variant-based visibility scaling.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: A swipeable, cyclic carousel for selecting meditation types with animated card positioning.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: A step-by-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, animated transitions, and optional benefits parsing.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: A mobile-only floating back button that navigates users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: A layout wrapper that applies page-wide background styling and renders the LotusCanvas behind child content.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: A canvas-based animated bowl visualization showing meditation minutes as rising liquid with glow effects.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: A 3D lotus growth visualization using React Three Fiber with lights, particles, and an auto-rotating camera.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: An SVG lotus that animates breathing, glow, and multi-layer petal growth based on total minutes and streak.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Interactive quiz dialog that asks five meditation-related questions, tracks answers, navigates between questions, and computes a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal that displays up to five saved rituals and lets the user start or delete them, with empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel component for browsing, starting, and deleting saved rituals with swipe, navigation, and confirmation dialog support.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Displays login or guest status and provides logout or return-to-start actions, clearing cached queries on logout.
Page navigation bar with theme toggle, back buttons, and session indicator for both desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout methods, and initializes AuthClient with stored or new identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a countdown meditation timer with pause, seek, progress tracking, and completion callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for meditation data, including mock meditation types, daily quotes, and session recording with guest fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles, OKLCH color themes for light/dark modes, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation-related books enriched with Amazon links and metadata.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Defines interfaces for quiz and technique content and exports detailed mindfulness technique data including pages and quiz questions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
Empty page placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays swipeable book recommendation cards with theme toggle, navigation, and gesture handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main user dashboard showing quotes, meditation options, rituals, theme toggle, and quiz handling.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Provides journal entry listing, filtering, editing, import/export, and favorite toggling.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Shows meditation technique content with category switching, scrolling, and quiz functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with theme toggle, login flow, guest mode, animated UI, and auto-redirect for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Pre-meditation setup page featuring mood/energy selection, guides, ambient sound picker, timers, and cloud-synced session preparation.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user meditation progress, ranks, streaks, and supports cloud export/import with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a reflection page.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a stats page.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Utilities for cloud sync readiness checks and mapping backend errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization and deserialization of meditation data for safe JSON export/import, including validation and bigint handling.
Local storage management for knowledge quiz scores, supporting guest and authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth visualization parameters over a 0–20,000 minute scale using phases, smooth transitions, and layered bloom states.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Manages guest‑mode meditation data in localStorage, including journal entries, progress tracking, and legacy data migration.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers based on total meditation minutes and provides helpers to get current/next rank and minutes until upgrade.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL/query parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, shadows, radii, and container settings with theme‑driven design tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata outlining current issues, feature requests, and state for UI fixes across meditation‑related pages.
